newsitem.title: USA: Sybase stake raised by Soros group.
newsitem.headline: Sybase stake raised by Soros group.

text.p: A group led by international financier George Soros said Tuesday it has raised its stake in Sybase Inc to 5,700,700 common or 7.46 percent from 5.15 percent held previously.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the purchase of 1,400,500 common shares between January 2 and January 31 at prices ranging from $16.855 to $18.023 per share.
The group holds the stake in the Emeryville, Calif.,-based company for investment purposes.
The company develops, markets and supports a full line of relational database management software products and services for on-line applications in networked computing environments.
